text: 4:15 1 Tesalonika 4:11; 1 Timoti 5:13; 1 Pita 2:20Ia uari uan osɨmtɨziba bagh mɨzaziba iniam, kamaghɨn derazir puvatɨ. Ian tongɨn tav gumazitam o amizitam mɨsueghtɨma an aremegham, o a biziba okɨmam, o a tintinimɨn arazir kurabar amuam, o a tintinimɨn gumazamizir igharazibar bizibar ganam, me an arazir kaba baghɨva osɨmtɨzim a darɨghtɨma, kamaghɨn derazir puvatɨ.
